_meta.sectionDetails: I am a software engineer who enjoys building business applications using Python, Go, and TypeScript. Previously, I have also worked as a mobile app developer, database administrator, Google Ads and Google Analytics analyst, and software development trainer.

children.title: Business Apps Developer
children.details: I create and maintain business-critical applications using a mixture of Python, Go, and TypeScript (Angular) for our client's Network Operations Center. I also analyze terabytes of data from Cloud SQL and BigQuery, and create interactive dashboards using Data Studio.

children.title: Database Administrator
children.details: I created and managed the system for splitting, handing over, and disposal of our telecommunications network assets to PLDT and Globe Telecom. children.title: Davao Graphic Designers Community
children.details: Davao Graphic Designers Community (DGDC) is a Sec. Registered Non-Profit Organization in Davao City, Philippines. We are a growing community of creatives  who shares same interest in the field of Graphic Design and Art in General. Our aim is to foster and showcase the talents here in the south while building a progressive and supportive community for artists.

children.title: Developers Connect Philippines
children.details: Developers Connect Philippines (DevCon) is a non-proﬁt organization which aims to promote the IT Pinoy Talent mainly by providing a unique venue for IT students, educators, professionals and enthusiasts to Sync, Support and Succeed.

_meta.address: E. Jacinto Street, 8016 Davao City, Philippines

children.title: AIESEC in Davao
children.details: AIESEC is an international non-governmental not-for-profit organization that provides young people with leadership development and cross-cultural global internship and volunteer exchange experiences across the globe, with a focus to empower young people so they can make a positive impact on society.

children.title: Director for Information Systems
children.subtitle: Marketing and Communications Department
children.details: I implemented systems to improve the daily operations and processes of our organization. I was also the one responsible for making sure that information is correctly and properly disseminated to our members and partners.

children.title: Logistics Manager and Exchange Participant Director

children.details: I oversee the international exchange participants' deliverables and communicate with the two partner institutions to ensure the success of the project.

children.title: Team Member
children.subtitle: Talent Management Department
children.details: I helped in the recruitment of new members and managed the exit interviews of our graduating members.

children.title: Ateneo Circle of Computer Studies Students
children.subtitle: E. Jacinto Street, 8016 Davao City, Philippines
children.details: The Ateneo Circle of Computer Studies Students or ACCSS is the only academic club for Computer Studies students in Ateneo de Davao University. It seeks to develop its members not just academically but also through events outside the school, while nurturing their spiritual growth and promoting social involvement.

children.title: Arrupe Office of Social Formation
children.details: The Arrupe Office of Social Formation is the social formation arm of Ateneo de Davao University. AOSF is responsible for developing students, faculty and staff, following the teaching and examples of Christ, to be persons for others and, through the promotion of justice, to become leaders in the service of the poor and powerless.
